snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500 hit a record intraday high as an industry report showed that manufacturing growth increased for a second straight month.
abstract: Stock market begins second quarter on positive note, with Standard & Poor's 500-stock index reaching nominal record high, as encouraging data on factory activity indicates economic growth.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500 hit a record intraday high as an industry report showed that manufacturing growth increased for a second straight month.

headline.main: Strong Start to 2nd Quarter, After Signals That the Economy Is Gaining Strength
headline.print_headline: Strong Start to 2nd Quarter, After Signals That the Economy Is Gaining Strength
